title: Which is the best online virtual world? - Quora

response.answer_text: This depends on what you call «best». I list here the only one which are appropriable, that is you can build your own environment and have your own projects, unlike for instance a video game. Second Life is certainly the most populous, but it is very expensive and prone to impractical changes of rules, so that many projects had to close. But if you want virtual sex, it is the best choice.The Halcyon project is much less expensive, but after the closure of Inworldz it has to rebuilt an users base. It is aimed at professionals, but not exclusively.Decentraland is a specialization of Unity, intended to make it more readily available to small builders.

One that you can perceive you are in and safely exit. The door must be observable at all times and freely gained or it is an unacceptable prison. It’s about respect of space. As for the game content, you should be able to flex without hurting anyone.
